New Records: Bradley Barcola netted his nation’s fastest-ever goal just 13 seconds into their Nations League match against Italy.
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predict a win probability of 35% for France, 30% for Belgium, and 35% for a draw.
France must avoid falling further behind in Group 2 standings to advance to the quarterfinal stage.
Belgium aims to exact revenge on France for their disappointing exit from Euro 2024.
